parametrized_description: Maximize the sum of ProfitPerDollarCondos multiplied by the investment in condos and ProfitPerDollarDetachedHouses multiplied by the investment in detached houses. The total investment must not exceed TotalBudget. The investment in condos must be at least MinimumPercentageCondos of the total investment. The investment in detached houses must be at least MinimumInvestmentDetachedHouses. All investment amounts must be non-negative.

ProfitPerDollarCondos.description: Profit per dollar invested in condos

ProfitPerDollarDetachedHouses.description: Profit per dollar invested in detached houses

MinimumPercentageCondos.description: Minimum percentage of total investment that must be in condos

MinimumInvestmentDetachedHouses.description: Minimum investment required in detached houses

InvestmentDetachedHouses.description: The amount invested in detached houses

constraints.description: The total investment must not exceed TotalBudget.
The investment in condos must be at least MinimumPercentageCondos of the total investment.
The investment in detached houses must be at least MinimumInvestmentDetachedHouses.
All investment amounts must be non-negative.

objective.description: Maximize the sum of ProfitPerDollarCondos multiplied by the investment in condos and ProfitPerDollarDetachedHouses multiplied by the investment in detached houses.
